data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Newcastle.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Burnley in the half of Newcastle.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Burnley at St James' Park.
In the minute 5, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Burnley drive forward through Dwight McNeil. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Burnley.
Free kick Newcastle.
David Coote awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 10, In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle's Jamal Lewis is caught offside.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
David Coote signals a Newcastle throw-in in Burnley's half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
David Coote signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
In the minute 14, Allan Saint-Maximin is on target to give Newcastle a 1-0 advantage.
Callum Wilson with an assist there.
Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, David Coote signals a free kick to Burnley.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 21, David Coote signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in for Burnley at St James' Park.
In the minute 23, Burnley awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 25, James Tarkowski of Burnley is pulled up for offside.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Newcastle drive forward but Allan Saint-Maximin is judged offside.
Newcastle surge into the attack at St James' Park but Callum Wilson’s header is off-target.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 33, Attention is being given to Newcastle’s Fabian Schar and play has been suspended briefly.
David Coote blows against Burnley's Ashley Barnes for offside.
Fabian Schar is back on his feet again.
In the minute 35, Burnley push forward at St James' Park and Dale Stephens gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
David Coote awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Free kick Burnley.
James Tarkowski (Burnley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Newcastle's Joelinton has been booked in Newcastle upon Tyne.
David Coote signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 38, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Emil Krafth.
Newcastle drives forward and Joelinton gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Emil Krafth is back on the pitch.
In the minute 40, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) has received a first yellow card.
Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
In the minute 42, David Coote signals a free kick to Burnley.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The match at St James' Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Allan Saint-Maximin, who is down injured.
In the minute 45, Newcastle's Allan Saint-Maximin looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Burnley at St James' Park.
Newcastle are coming forward and Jeff Hendrick gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Burnley have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Burnley.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Newcastle.
David Coote signals a free kick to Burnley.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 49, David Coote awards the away team a throw-in.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At St James' Park, Jamal Lewis has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Newcastle.
Burnley to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
Throw-in Burnley.
In the minute 52, Burnley's Chris Wood gets in a shot on goal at St James' Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Burnley to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
David Coote signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 55, Steve Bruce is making the team's first substitution at St James' Park with Javi Manquillo replacing Fabian Schar.
Burnley awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
In the minute 61, Burnley have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Goal! Ashley Westwood equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Throw-in for Burnley at St James' Park.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Burnley.
Javi Manquillo (Newcastle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal! Callum Wilson gives Newcastle a 2-1 lead in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 65, Allan Saint-Maximin instrumental with a fine assist.
Chris Wood for the away team is judged to be offside.
In Newcastle upon Tyne, Chris Wood (Burnley) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Joelinton for Newcastle is whistled offside.
Free kick for Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 68, Sean Dyche (Burnley) is making a first substitution, with Johann Gudmundsson replacing Dale Stephens.
Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dwight McNeil is booked for the away team.
In the minute 70, Newcastle have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Newcastle.
Isaac Hayden for Newcastle drives towards goal at St James' Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, The home team replace Allan Saint-Maximin with Ryan Fraser.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Free kick for Burnley in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Coote signals a Newcastle throw-in in Burnley's half.
Newcastle have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 77, Callum Wilson gives Newcastle a 3-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Matej Vydra is replacing Ashley Barnes for Burnley at St James' Park.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Newcastle upon Tyne to check on Emil Krafth, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 80, Ryan Fraser gets his shot on target but fails to score for Newcastle.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by David Coote.
Newcastle's Emil Krafth is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 81, David Coote signals a throw-in for Newcastle, close to Burnley's area.
Burnley will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Newcastle.
Burnley's Matej Vydra has run offside.
In the minute 82, Newcastle are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle attack through Jeff Hendrick. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 83, Burnley have a goal kick.
Chris Wood for Burnley is whistled offside.
Burnley needs to be cautious. Newcastle have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
Can Burnley capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Free kick Burnley.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
David Coote signals a free kick to Burnley.
Burnley's Kevin Long breaks free at St James' Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Newcastle's Sean Longstaff gets his shot away but it misses the target.
David Coote awards Burnley a goal kick.
Newcastle's Callum Wilson has run offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-1.
The home team have replaced Joelinton with Sean Longstaff. This is the third substitution made today by Steve Bruce.
